title: CMS To STOP (disable) sending data (phone numbers/addresses) to SECLI using MQ -PROD LIKE
time_sequence: CF - DATA LOADING IN STAGING TABLES

task_list.instruction_title:
**PROD ONLY**

Stop CMS Fatca agent in PROD-LIKE - on FridayÂ morning so that SECLI does not receive any data-feed from CMS.

The process that sends data to Secli using MQ runs at night (AROUND 9:30 pm)

Note: The process is restored in IP Task [PRE-13927](PRE-13927_116109862.html)
PRD : Reschedule Daily CMS-Secli interface to Monday after CSD Migration
